# Birthweight
## First-trimester exposure to the Great Recession

```{r}
m_BW_bam_GR_1st_trimester <- bam(BW ~ s(GA_weeks) +  s(mat_age) + s(birth_Y_M_num) + s(month, bs="cc") + s(mean_ssep2) + s(mean_Alt_mean2)+ parity_cat + sex + Urban3 + Language + mother_nationality_cat2 + civil_status3 + HW + GR_first_trimester + COVID_first_wave + COVID_second_wave, data=bevn_eco_in7) 
summary(m_BW_bam_GR_1st_trimester)
gam.check(m_BW_bam_GR_1st_trimester)

  beta <- coef(m_BW_bam_GR_1st_trimester)
  Vb <- vcov(m_BW_bam_GR_1st_trimester, unconditional = TRUE)
  se <- sqrt(diag(Vb))
  n <- 1184860
  d <- (abs(beta)/(sqrt(n)*se))
  my.ci.1sttrim <- data.frame(cbind(beta, lci = beta-1.96*se, uci = beta + 1.96*se, d))
  my.ci.1sttrim <- round(head(my.ci.1sttrim,18), 2)
  my_ci_GR_BW_1st_trim <- format(round(my.ci.1sttrim[16, c(1:4)], digits=2), nsmall=2)
  my_ci_GR_BW_1st_trim
```

# Stillbirth

## First-trimester exposure to the Great Recession

```{r}
m_SB_bam_GR_1st_trimester <- bam(stillbirth ~ s(GA_weeks) +  s(mat_age) +  s(birth_Y_M_num) +s(month, bs="cc") + s(mean_ssep2) + s(mean_Alt_mean2)  +  sex + Urban3 + Language + mother_nationality_cat2 + civil_status3 + HW + GR_first_trimester + COVID_first_wave + COVID_second_wave, family="binomial", data=bevn_eco_in6) 
summary(m_SB_bam_GR_1st_trimester)
gam.check(m_SB_bam_GR_1st_trimester)

  OR <- exp(coef(m_SB_bam_GR_1st_trimester))
  beta <- coef(m_SB_bam_GR_1st_trimester)
  Vb <- vcov(m_SB_bam_GR_1st_trimester, unconditional = TRUE)
  se <- sqrt(diag(Vb))
  lci <- exp(beta-1.96*se)
  uci <- exp(beta+1.96*se)
  d <- abs(beta)/1.81
  my_ci_SB_1st_trim <- data.frame(cbind(OR, lci, uci, d))
  my_ci_SB_1st_trim <- round(head(my_ci_SB_1st_trim, 15), 2)
  my_ci_SB_GR_1st_trim <- format(round(my_ci_SB_1st_trim[13, c(1:4)], digits=2), nsmall=2)
  my_ci_SB_GR_1st_trim
```
